Not a perfect solution but will work for now 😊

Thanks for that

Bonnie​​​​ Sudirwan

Hi Bonnie,

We have put a redirect in place,
https://spidertarp.com/product/spider-smart-tarp-waterproof-pickup-long-bed/
https://spidertarp.com/product/spider-smart-tarp-waterproof-pickup-short-bed/
https://spidertarp.com/product/spider-smart-tarp-waterproof-pickup-standard-bed/
https://spidertarp.com/product/spider-cord-with-hook-and-carabiner-24-four-pack/
https://spidertarp.com/product/spider-cord-with-hook-and-carabiner-48-twin-pack/
https://spidertarp.com/product/spider-cord-with-hooks-48-twin-pack/

If you are in AU you will be redirect to /shop page when you visit these products

Hi Joel,

Correct - they are all US SKUs. Any product that says "US SKU" (example below) is only available to the US market.



Thanks

Bonnie​​​​ Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

Hi Bonnie,

We are looking into this, can you please confirm if these are the products that are not available in AU?
Spider-Cord with Hooks 48” Twin Pack
Spider-Cord with Hook and Carabiner 24” Four Pack
Spider Smart Tarp Waterproof Short Bed Pickup
Spider Smart Tarp Waterproof Standard Bed Pickup
Spider Smart Tarp Waterproof Long Bed Pickup
Spider-Cord with Hook and Carabiner 48″ Twin Pack
We will put a redirect in place, if one of these products are visited from AU they will be redirect to the shop page?

Hi Joel,

I have gotten to the bottom of this, and the products that are not shoppable are US only SKUs. Is there any way we can prevent these SKUs from appearing for AU site visitors?

Thanks

Bonnie​​​​ Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
Workflows ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
